column4: i see you talking about video cards, do you knwo how to switch  hybriud graphics?

whenever i try to use switcheroo to change to my discrete gpu with this command `echo DIS > /sys/kernel/debug/vgaswitcheroo/switch` i get the error vga_switcheroo: client 0 refused switch in my syslog, how do i switch cards?
vga_switcharoo for amd, bumblebee(buggy) for nvidia
